title: when someone tries to insult people by calling them kid

replies.body: Or maybe they're just older than you?
being a kid isnt an insult...but they say it like i should be on the floor crying.

as an adult im jealous of the kids. ive been thinking about going back to school to become a teach for the summer off. i hate sitting at my desk, looking out the window all summer, and feeling jealous of a bunch of children because they get to play
It's like looking into a window of my future now that I'm out of college.

This is why you find a 4/10 job and get Fridays off (or a 9/80)

EDIT: that's 4 days a week, 10 hours a day.   9/80 is 9 hours a day Mon-Thurs, 8 hours every other Friday, and the other Friday off

I worked 11-7 right out of college and loved that. I could go out any day of the week and sleep it off but now that i have a regular 8-5 job and two kids, its hard to find time for anything. I have loved League since day one and usually get yelled at for trying to stay up and play by the girlfriend. I just want to be a kid again! god i sound bitter.
is your university a prison? XD

nah, but it was a mental health institute before becoming an university :O

The room i am talking about is my home.
That sounds haunted my dude.
nah, is rather nice instead, before becoming a mental institute it was a palace. thought there is some creepy shit sometimes O_O
How can you even league with the ghost of side show bob hovering all around you? XD

See, that' s why i am silver.

... yeah, sure, that' s why

Hey man, we all have our reasons why we are silver.
I should be challenger but the ghosts of two little kids won't leave me alone when i'm playing. NVM they're not ghosts XD

shut up and put your diaper back on kid

...nothing personal kid
psh, nothing personel...kid
SO... that makes you an old ass dude playing video games then right? Then by golly wow call me a kid! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
My 47 year old father plays. Would that justify him calling someone a kid?
That man should be working not playing league xD
He works full time, but he plays with me and my siblings. He's pretty bad and it's tons of fun.
Man you are freaking lucky! I wish my dad would take some time to not be a workaholic and play some league. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Feelsbadman

> [{quoted}](name=bulldoggamer,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=q3v8aqEF,comment-id=000100010002000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-22T14:39:15.491+0000)
>
> Feelsdadman

ftfy
I feel it more like "don't talk shit to me kid, I've been playing since before you were in diapers" At least its that way to me.
Cuz theirs nothing worse than some snot nose brat telling you that you're wrong when you are a veteran.
There is something worse, when they are right.
Yeah lol
https://cdn.meme.am/instances/400x/28191623.jpg
I actually like this one better... kid!
What if I am playing{{champion:1}} ?
Pray you don't run into Vel'koz or Illaoi
especially when you have lulu in your team

Kid is a funny insult cause it only insults kids.

Thus you know that when it's thrown out, it's by some kid who thinks he's being clever.

(Or yanno, a juvenile 20+ year old who will one day, maybe, grow up)

Who the hell decided insults should be graded on how much shock factor they use? Shock factor is cheap, generally impersonal, and bland. A well-weathered person like me derives absolutely no pleasure from appeals to shock factor. I like creative, literate insults that are poetically accurate. In that sense, I find calling someone a child/synonym for child/immature to be a perfectly suitable insult in various ways and situations. If you think insulting anyone over the internet in any way is ever supposed to make you look like a badass, let alone insulting someone with the same default/tired shockfactor shit ("kill yourself") like a gradeshooler who just discovered 4-chan, you are going about it all wrong.

That being said. I don't actually insult people in game, that would get me banned. I don't know why I'm talking like I condone it., but I'm a pretty good trashtalker outside of this game where I can't get banned for it.

I personally like to relate people to the primate order

"Boosted baboon!"
{{champion:62}} U wut m8?

When someone is being dumb, I call them a business major. 9/10 times I can tell they're a business major by how dumb they're acting. Then they are sitting there like, "uh, why is that an insult?" because they don't understand it. Meanwhile everyone else is lol'ing at them.
This comment reminds of {{champion:202}}
4 UPVOTES. DUH DUH DUH

when someone tries to insult me by calling me a kid

http://i.makeagif.com/media/9-05-2015/08VmRR.gif

For the most part its dumb especially if its due to in game decisions (whether you're 8 or 80 you might just be newer to the game). Sometimes I think its actually warranted though like if you've ever had that guy spamming in caps. Maybe its just me but I always picture a kid that never learned to use an indoor voice or keep his/her cool. By losing your cool you add fuel to a bad situation and it reminds me of the little kids in the grocery store throwing a tantrum over mommy not buying them a candy bar.

>like if you've ever had that guy spamming in caps.

Or iF YoU tYPe LikE tHiS (ie, your name)
The feeling when you are a kid, and then have the right to call them an old geezer
I like it because I'm almost 34, and the chances that they're older than me are slim.
IMA KID and I'm not insulted
all them kidDos still waiting for some more pWnage. can't wait to dish out the Pwn cuz I'm so badasssauce

I get all sarcastic ans say some like this "Oh no you said the "k" word." They usually don't say anything after that for a while or change the subject real quick. Sarcasm my my greatest weapon in this game. Some of the things people say is mind blowing.

I'm always like, "_Yes, I do have parents._"

Suddenly, they are out of smart remarks.

http://66.media.tumblr.com/c0e3962fdd32cc0513b99d3a05bcd43f/tumblr_o6h2x0gko81v9y3mmo1_400.jpg
